title: BMI Calculator
description: Use this free online BMI calculator to instantly compute your Body Mass Index and weight category from height and weight.
helper: Enter your height in centimeters and weight in kilograms. Decimals are supported.

result.title: Your BMI
result.empty: Add your numbers to see the result.

range.title: BMI Categories
range.note: BMI is a general guide and should be interpreted with individual health context.

openGraph.title: BMI Calculator
openGraph.description: Free BMI calculator for quick Body Mass Index checks. Enter height (cm) and weight (kg) to see underweight, normal, overweight, and obese ranges for everyday fitness and weight-management tracking.
